altTitles.ja: テロメア

description.en:
Two siblings are roaming a post-apocalyptic world destroyed by a zombie epidemic 10 years ago. For some reason these two kids aren't getting attacked by the zombies.


(Source: Manga Mogura RE)

title.en: Subete no Jinrui o Hakai Suru. Sorera wa Saisei Dekinai.

altTitles.ja: すべての人類を破壊する。それらは再生できない。

altTitles.ja-ro: Subete no Jinrui wo Hakai Suru. Sorera ha Saisei Dekinai.

altTitles.ja: Destroy all humankind. They can't be regenerated.

altTitles.en: Destroy All Humans. They Can’t Be Regenerated. A Magic: The Gathering Manga
Destroy All Humankind. They Can't Be Regenerated.
Destroy All of Humanity. It Can't Be Regenerated.

altTitles.es-la: Destruye a toda la humanidad. Ellos no pueden regenerarse.

altTitles.ru: Уничтожите всё человечество. Оно не может быть регенерировано.

altTitles.pt-br: Destrua Toda a Humanidade. Eles Não Podem Ser Regenerados.

description.en: This “youth graffiti” manga centers on two people in the 1990s who play the Magic the Gathering trading card game.
description.es-la: El manga de "youth graffiti" se centra en dos personas de los años 90 que juegan al juego de cartas coleccionables Magic the Gathering.
description.pt-br:
Julho de 1999, o mês em que o mundo será destruído segundo Nostradamus. O estudante do fundamental, chamado Hajime, sempre fica atrás de sua rival, a bela Sawatari. Ela não o considera como seu rival, após de ter se introduzido como tal. Ele também é um avido jogador de "Magic: The Gathering". Enquanto ele procura novas cartas ele descobre que a Sawatari também joga MTG, mas escondida. Ela foge após reconhecer ele durante uma partida do card game. No dia seguinte ele desafia ela para um duelo, com um deck especial criado para ganhar dela, prometendo ficar falado e fazer qualquer coisa que ela desejar caso perca. Uma coisa leva a outra e eles finalmente se tornam amigos. Que no fim ele lembra que este era seu objetivo inicial. 

| O título do manga é um trocadilho com a descrição da carta "Cólera de Deus" que é "Destrua todas as criaturas. Elas não podem ser regeneradas." |

title.en: Kara no Kyoukai: The Garden of Sinners

altTitles.ja: 空の境界 the Garden of sinners

altTitles.zh: 空之境界the Garden of sinners

altTitles.vi: Khu vườn của những tội nhân

description.en:
A very popular early work from Kinoko Nasu from the Tsukihime & Fate fame, the Kara no Kyoukai universe has meet great success as an animated film adaptation, novels and radio dramas.  
  
Kara no Kyoukai depicts a world where the true dark nature of the human being is being reviewed and exposed by shocking and ruthless events, and in the center of it all we have Ryougi Shiki, the true heir to the long lived, wealthy and mysterious Ryougi clan and Kokuto Mikiya, a would be normal high school student if it wouldn't be for his amazing deductive & investigative progress.  
  
The moment Kokuto and Shiki meet is the moment that the wheel of fate started to turn, however is this fate moving forward naturally on it's own accord, or is it all being orchestrated from behind the scenes by an enigmatic persona? Only time will tell.

altTitles.en: A Terrified Teacher at Ghoul School!

altTitles.ja: 妖怪学校の先生はじめました！

altTitles.tr: Ghoul Okulunda Dehşete Düşmüş Bir Öğretmen

description.en: Haruaki is a scaredy-cat with a fetish for girls' school uniforms, but he also wants to be a good teacher. However, his new school isn’t exactly what he thought it would be: it's an academy for monsters, demons, ghosts and all sorts of supernatural creatures!

title.en: Go! Ina Junior High Ping-Pong Club

altTitles.ja: 行け！稲中卓球部

description.en:
There are six members of the boy's ping pong club. Two are relatively normal; however, the other four consist of an aspiring sexual deviant, two perverts, and a guy with lethal B.O. Add in a cantakerous girl as a manager, and you have the entire crew.  
  
This series pushes the boundaries of good taste beyond anything the western world has experienced, yet somehow manages to remain vaguely charming. The antics of the ping pong club includes one member's trademark "Protruding Pecker Serve," molesting cross-dressing members, and the infamous "Turtle Sequence," which is much too horrifying to describe.  
  
In 1996, this manga won the Kodansha Manga Award for general manga.

黒猫がおんなのこになったお話

description.en:
This is a story about a black cat who became a cat girl.

altTitles.ja: ぼっち・ざ・ろっく！

description.en: Hitori Gotou is a high school girl who's starting to learn to play the guitar because she dreams of being in a band, but she's so shy that she hasn't made a single friend. However her dream might come true after she meets Nijika Ijichi, a drummer girl looking for a new guitarist for her band.
description.es: Bocchi The Rock! cuenta la historia de Goto Hitori, una chica de secundaria que empieza a aprender a tocar la guitarra persiguiendo su sueño de formar parte de una banda. Pese a que es muy dedicada, su arrolladora timidez le impide poder conseguir siquiera una amiga. Pero cuando conozca a Ijichi Nijika, una baterista que está buscando una nueva guitarrista para su grupo, Goto dará el primer paso para cumplir su gran sueño página a página, tira a tira.
description.it:
Hitori Goto è una liceale che inizia a imparare a suonare la chitarra perchè il suo sogno è di entrare a far parte di una band, 
ma è talmente timida da non avere nemmeno un amico. 
Ma il suo sogno potrebbe avverarsi in seguito all'incontro con Nijika Ijichi, una ragazza che suona la batteria 
ed è alla ricerca proprio di un chitarrista per la band in cui suona.
description.ja: 「ぼっちちゃん」こと後藤ひとりは、ギターを愛する孤独な少女。家で一人寂しく弾くだけの毎日でしたが、ひょんなことから伊地知虹夏が率いる「結束バンド」に加入することに。人前での演奏に不慣れな後藤は、立派なバンドマンになれるのか――！？全国のぼっちな少年少女に届ける、いま最高にアツい音楽漫画！！陰キャならロックをやれ！！！
description.pt-br:
Hitori Gotou é uma colegial que está começando a aprender a tocar violão porque sonha em fazer parte de uma banda, mas é tão tímida que não fez um único amigo. No entanto, seu sonho pode se tornar realidade depois que ela conhece Nijika Ijichi, uma garota que toca bateria e está procurando um novo guitarrista para sua banda.

[ 1° TEMP.  DO ANIME ADAPTOU ATÉ: Vol. 2, Cap 21. ]

altTitles.ja: ガールズ×ヴァンパイア

title.en: Gal Can't Be Kind to Otaku!?

altTitles.ja: オタクに優しいギャルはいない!?

altTitles.ja-ro: Otaku ni Yasashii Gyaru wa Inai!?
Otaku ni Yasashii Gyaru ha Inai!?

altTitles.zh: 没有辣妹会对阿宅温柔!?

altTitles.pt-br: Gal Não Pode ser Gentil com Otaku!?

altTitles.es-la: ¿¡Las Gals no pueden ser amables con los Otakus!?

altTitles.vi: Gyaru không thể tử tế với Otaku ư?

description.en: Takuya Seo is an otaku who likes "anime for girls" and can't say he likes it out loud. One day, he hooks up with two gals from his class, Amane and Ijichi, but it seems that Amane is also an otaku...
description.ja: あまり大きな声で好きと言えない“女児向けアニメ”が好きなオタク 瀬尾卓也。ある日、クラスのギャル 天音さんと伊地知さんに絡まれたのだが、何やら天音さんもオタクの匂いが…？
description.vi: Một anh bạn trung bình Otaku thích anime dành cho bé gái, giáp mặt hai nàng Gyaru xinh đẹp nổi tiếng nhất trường. Nhưng không chỉ có thế, một trong hai nữ nhân xinh đẹp ấy có gì đó...hơi otaku thì phải...?
description.es-la: Takuya Seo es un otaku al que le gusta el "anime para chicas" y no puede decir que le guste en voz alta. Un día, se junta con dos chicas de su clase, Amane e Ijichi, pero parece que Amane también es una otaku...
description.pt-br: Takuya Seo é um otaku que gosta de "animes para garotinhas" e não pode dizer isso em voz alta. Um dia, ele conversa com duas gals da sua sala, Amane e Ijichi, mas parece que a Amane também é uma otaku... Uma comédia romântica escolar onde o otaku conhece as gals que ele gosta!

altTitles.fr: Survie pendant la fin du monde

description.en:
A boy was locked in a basement and trained his entire life. His deranged father, the one who confined him, declared, 


“The Apocalypse is coming.” 

Now, armed with the training and survival skills he had honed over years of practice, he must survive the impending apocalypse.
description.pt-br:
Um garoto foi trancado em um bunker e foi treinado a vida inteira. Seu pai perturbado, aquele que o confinou, declarou: 

“O Apocalipse está chegando”.

Agora, armado com o treinamento e as habilidades de sobrevivência que ele havia aprimorado ao longo de anos de prática, ele deve sobreviver ao apocalipse iminente.

altTitles.ja: 左 甚五郎

description.en: Based on the life of real life historical figure/potentially mythological artist Hidari Jingoro. Jingoro is an extremely talented woodworker, sculptor, painter, wordsmith, you name it. But when his lover, Osen suddenly falls ill he must use his artistic skills to make her healthy again.

altTitles.ja: WORST外伝 ゼットン先生

description.en: After years of studying, Hanazawa Saburou, AKA Suzuran's legendary Zetton, has finally become a high school teacher. But on his first day at work, the principal tells him he was actually hired not to teach, but to make the students of his homeroom class drop out of school?!
description.ru: После долгих лет учёбы Сабуро Ханадзава, также известный как легендарный Зеттон Судзурана, наконец-то стал учителем средней школы. Но в первый же день на работе директор рассказал ему, что на самом деле его наняли не для того, чтобы преподавать, а для того, чтобы заставить учеников вверенного ему класса бросить школу!

altTitles.ja: きみは四葉のクローバー

altTitles.en: You are a Four Leaf Clover

description.en: Uichi was once popular, but now he is being bullied excessively. Then suddenly, his first love, Yotsuha, appears in front of him. What is this cute and brave girl's purpose...?
description.ja: かつての人気者で、今は過激ないじめを受ける宇一。そんな彼の前に突然現れた初恋の相手・よつは。可愛く健気な彼女の目的とは一体…!?
description.vi: Câu chuyện romcom nhẹ nhàng về hành trình chữa lành trái tim đã tan vỡ của main
description.zh: 某天，曾很有人气的宇一的生活陡然一变。 以往光芒四射的日子被用抹布也无法擦去的黑暗所笼罩。 这时，熟悉宇一过去的初恋—— 四叶突然出现在了他的面前。 她的目的究竟是…！？

altTitles.ja: エレキシード

description.en:
Jiwoo is a kind-hearted young man who harnesses the lightning quick reflexes of a cat to secretly make the world a better place – one saved little child or foster pet at a time. Kayden is a secret agent on the run, who finds himself stuck in the body of a …um… decidedly fat old fluffy cat. Together, armed with Jiwoo’s super powers and Kayden’s uber-smarts, they’re out to fight those forces who would let evil rule this world. That is, if they can stand each other long enough to get the job done.

Jiwoo es un joven amable que utiliza sus reflejos increíblemente rápidos, como los de un gato, para hacer del mundo un mejor lugar salvando niños o mascotas. Kayden es un agente secreto prófugo que termina encerrado en el cuerpo de un... mmm... gato gordo, peludo y viejo. Juntos y con la ayuda de los superpoderes de Jiwoo y la inteligencia de Kayden lucharán contra las fuerzas que desean que el mal tome control del mundo. Aunque solo lo lograrán si consiguen soportarse lo suficiente para hacerlo.

Кайден - загадочный человек, который словно комета спустился с неба. Весь израненный, почти потерявший последние силы, он решает скрыть свое присутствие - ведь по-другому от погони не уйти. По дороге Кайден встречает обычную дворовую кошку и, почти не думая, решает вселиться в ее тело. Со Чжи У - энергичный и общительный молодой человек из средней школы, который очень любит кошек. Один раз по пути домой он встречает до боли потрепанного кота и берет его к себе домой. Наш У не только добрый, но еще и обладает одной скрытой способностью. Какой же?

description.en:
Kantarou, who has ascended to heaven because he is too sick, reincarnates in a different world. Kantarou, who is distorted in character and is a fatty, is disliked even after reincarnating, but notices that a cloudy potion that cures anything from his crotch appears. Moreover, it also has the effect of powering up the demons, and it will be loved by the demons…!? A different world reincarnation fantasy that is unmatched in the crotch!!!

- [niconico Manga](https://manga.nicovideo.jp/comic/55354)
description.ja: ヌキすぎて昇天してしまった汗太郎(かんたろう)は異世界に転生する。キモデブで性格も歪んでいる汗太郎は転生した先でも嫌われてしまうが、自分の股間から何でも治してしまう白濁色のポーションが出ることに気づく。しかもそれは魔族をパワーアップさせる効果も持っていて、魔族からも求愛されることに……!?股間で無双する異世界転生ファンタジー!!!

title.en: "Omae Gotoki ga Maou ni Kateru to Omou na" to Yuusha Party wo Tsuihou Sareta node, Outo de Kimama ni Kurashitai

altTitles.ja: 「お前ごときが魔王に勝てると思うな」と勇者パーティを追放されたので、王都で気ままに暮らしたい THE COMIC

altTitles.en: Do You Think Someone Like You Can Defeat the Demon King?

altTitles.zh: 「就凭你也想打败魔王吗」被勇者一行所驱逐的少女要如何才能在王都过上自由的生活

altTitles.zh-hk: 「憑妳也想討伐魔王？」被勇者小隊逐出隊伍，只好在王都自在過活

altTitles.zh-ro: "Jiù píng nǐ yě xiǎng dǎbài mówáng ma" bèi yǒngzhě yīxíng suǒ qūzhú de shàonǚ yào rúhé cáinéng zài wáng dōuguò shàng zìyóu de shēnghuó

altTitles.en: ROLL OVER AND DIE: I Will Fight for an Ordinary Life with My Love and Cursed Sword!

altTitles.vi: Ngươi Nghĩ Một Kẻ Như Ngươi Có Thể Tiêu Diệt Quỷ Vương?

description.en:
According to the god Origin's prophecy, the girl Flum was chosen to be one of the members of the party that were foretold to defeat the Demon Lord. Everyone already had achievements to their name, as well as the strength to back them up. However, only Flum did not possess any combat prowess, and all of her stats were 0 due to her rare affinity. While being constantly berated, she continued to put great efforts to be useful to the heroes.     

Until one day, she was tricked by one of the party members who said that she “was not necessary anymore” and sold off to a slave trader. Flum was forced to live as a slave, locked away and barely fed. There she encountered a “cursed sword” and realized the true power of her rare affinity, “Reversal.”   The girl, who acquired the power to fight, was indifferent to the Demon Lord and decided to live peacefully as an adventurer alongside a slave girl she met.    

——This is a story of one girl who continued to crawl up from the very bottom in order to regain her peaceful everyday life.

altTitles.ja: 今日もベランダで

altTitles.vi: Lại gặp nhau ở ban công rồi

altTitles.th: วันนี้ที่ระเบียง

description.en: A freelance designer loves to relax from work through gardening on his balcony. There he starts talking to his new neighbor next door over the wall without knowing her face.
description.ja: フリーのエディトリアルデザイナー・土岐田旬は、仕事に追われ部屋に籠りっぱなしの毎日。癒やしを求めてベランダガーデニングにハマるように。そんなある日、隣にちょっと変わった天然系の女性が引っ越してきた。ふとした出来事から、お互いの顔も知らぬままベランダの隔壁越しに話をするようになる二人。実は隣の女性は新進俳優・成海游なのだが……。ベランダとグリーンが繋ぐ隔壁越しの二人は？
description.ru:
Фрилансер дизайнер-редактор Сюн Токита настолько занят своей работой, что целыми днями сидит взаперти в своей квартире. В поисках отдыха он пристрастился к балконному садоводству. Однажды по соседству с ним поселяется необычная женщина природной красоты. Они начинают разговаривать через стенку балкона, не зная друг друга в лицо. На самом деле соседка — восходящая актриса Ю Наруми...
Балкон и зелень объединяют их через перегородку.
description.uk: Дизайнер-фрілансер любить відпочивати від роботи, займаючись садівництвом на своєму балконі. Там він починає розмовляти зі своєю новою сусідкою через стіну, не знаючи її в обличчя.

title.en: Suterare Elf-san wa Sekai de Ichiban Tsuyokute Kawaii!

altTitles.ja: 捨てられエルフさん は世界で一番強くて可愛い！

altTitles.en: The Abandoned Elf is the Strongest and Cutest in the World!

altTitles.hu: A magára hagyott elf lány a világ legerősebb és legaranyosabbja!

description.en:
"Dear top players, this game is a real parallel world. If you reincarnate and save the world, any wish you have will be granted."

Former popular voice actress Ayano responded to the proposal from the goddess. In order to shine as a voice actress once again. Reincarnated as the strongest species of high elf, she aims to "clear the game" in the parallel world with the strongest and cutest kemo-eared heroine using her gaming knowledge, but –!?
description.hu:
**【Egykori toplistás játékos】+【Játékvilág】= Szuper verhetetlen!? Folytatom az életet a legerősebb énemmel!!**

„Kedves top játékosok! Ez a játék egy valós párhuzamos világ. Ha újjászülettek és megmentitek a világot, bármilyen kívánságotokat teljesítjük.”

Erre az istennő ajánlatára válaszolt Ayano, egykori népszerű szinkronszínész. Azért, hogy ismét ragyoghasson szinkronszínészként, a legerősebb faj, a nemes elf egyikeként született újjá. Most, a legerősebb és legaranyosabb állatfüles hősnővel karöltve, játékbeli tudását felhasználva célja a párhuzamos világban a „játék végigjátszása” - de vajon sikerül-e neki!?
description.ja:
「トッププレイヤーの皆様。このゲームは実在する異世界です。転生し、世界を救えばどんな願いも叶えてあげましょう」

女神からの提案に、元人気声優のアヤノは応えた。炎上して干された今、もう一度声優として輝くために。炎上後にゲームをやり込みトップランカーとなったアヤノは、その知識を生かして、最強種【ハイエルフ】に転生! 最強可愛いケモ耳ヒロイン・ホムラとともに異世界での“ゲームクリア”を目指すが、この世界はただの「ゲーム世界」ではないようで――!?

description.en:
Based on the 2019 movie "Nezha"  
  
Over a thousand years, spiritual energy of the earth and heavens merged to form a Chaos Pearl. Yuanshi Tianzun refined it into a Demon Pill and a Spirit Pearl.  
  
The Spirit Pearl, which was supposed to be reincarnated into Nezha's body, was stolen by Shen Gongbao and given to the East Dragon King. As such, the Third Prince Aobing, the reincarnation of the Spirit Pearl, was born. Surrounding Aobing is a series of events about growth, and a battle against the Dragons that is beginning.

title.en: Hacking Ghost Karada ni Shika Kachi no Nai

altTitles.ja: HACKING GHOST〜カラダにしか価値のない学園〜

description.en:
In an era where one in every twenty people awakens to a "special ability," Hiroto Takigami is a weak ability user who can only communicate with spirits. However, for some reason, his stepsister Rei, the most powerful ability user, harbors deep hatred toward him. The moment he graduates from an ability training institution and gains full control over his power, Rei kills him.

With only one year left to live—his "remaining lifespan" set—Hiroto falls into despair. Just then, a certain spirit appears before him, revealing an unexpected secret about his ability…

An unprecedented "body takeover" supernatural battle begins!
description.ja: 人類の20人に1人が「特殊能力」に目覚めた時代。霊と話せるだけの弱小能力者・滝神広人は、ある理由で最強の能力者である義姉・麗から激しく憎まれていた。能力者育成機関から卒業し、能力を自由に使役できるようになった瞬間、広人は麗によって殺される。「余命」は１年ーー。絶望する広人の前に、ある1人の霊が現れる。そこで告げられたのは、思いもよらない能力の秘密で‥‥。前代未聞の”カラダ乗っ取り系”異能バトル！

altTitles.ja: 機巧童子ULTIMO

description.en: High above Farmless City, citizens are stunned by the sudden appearance of two floating figures. Are they human boys, monolithic robots, or something much more strange? As the battle ensues between them, destruction and devastation falls on the hapless city. One figure is Vice, and seems to be as evil as his name implies. The other is Ultimo, intent on trying to stop Vice from wreaking more havoc. But who are Vice and Ultimo really? Where did they come from? A new mystery begins with the fate of the world possibly hanging in the balance!

altTitles.th: สนามเด็กล่า

altTitles.pt-br: Uma Sensação de Diversão com seus brinquedos

description.en:
Lee Myung-jun, the Vice Chairman of Hyundo Group, lost his daughter to a group of bullies. Seeking revenge, he adopts Yoon Karma, a psychopathic defector girl.

Yoon Karma: A sadistic human weapon created through drug experiments in North Korea. After killing everyone in the research lab, she escaped to South Korea on her own.

Having just been released from a juvenile detention center in South Korea, Yoon Karma sets out to hunt down the bullies at school, driven by the desire to avenge her new father and satisfy her sadistic pleasures.
description.pt-br:
Lee Myung-jun, o vice-presidente do grupo Hyundo, perdeu sua filha para um grupo de pessoas que faziam bullying. Buscando vingança, ele adota Yoon Karma, uma garota desertora psicopata.
Yoon Karma: Uma arma humana sádica criada por meio de experimentos com drogas na Coreia do Norte. Depois de matar todos no laboratório de pesquisa, ela escapou para a Coreia do Sul sozinha.
Tendo acabado de ser libertada de um centro de detenção juvenil na Coreia do Sul, Yoon Karma sai para caçar os valentões na escola, movida pelo desejo de vingar seu novo pai e satisfazer seus prazeres sádicos.

altTitles.th: เอ็กซอร์ซิสต์พันธุ์ปิศาจ

altTitles.ja: 青のエクソシスト
青の祓魔師

description.en:
Rin and his exorcist classmates are caught in a secret war against the forces of darkness.
Raised by Father Fujimoto, a famous exorcist, Rin Okumura never knew his real father. One day a fateful argument with Father Fujimoto forces Rin to face a terrible truth—the blood of the demon lord Satan runs in Rin’s veins! Rin swears to defeat Satan, but doing that means entering the mysterious True Cross Academy and becoming an exorcist himself.
description.fr: Ce monde se compose de deux dimensions jointes en une seule, comme un miroir. Le premier est le monde dans lequel vivent les humains, Assiah. L’autre est le monde des démons, la géhenne. Habituellement, voyager entre les deux, et même tout type de contact entre les deux, est impossible. Cependant, les démons peuvent passer dans ce monde en possédant tout ce qui existe en son sein. Satan est peut-être le roi des démons, mais il y a une chose qu’il n’a pas, et c’est une substance dans le monde humain qui est assez puissante pour le contenir ! Dans ce but, il a créé Rin, son fils avec une femme humaine, mais le fils acceptera-t-il ses plans? Ou va-t-il devenir autre chose...? Un exorciste ?
description.tr: Dünya, ayna gibi birbirine zıt iki farklı boyuttan oluşmaktaydı: İnsanların yaşadığı Assiah ve iblislerin hüküm sürdüğü Gehenna. Bu iki boyut arasında iletişim ve seyahat mümkün olmamasına rağmen iblisler, insanların ruhlarını ele geçirerek Assiah'a ulaşabiliyorlardı.İblislerin tanrısı Şeytan, kendisini barındırabilecek kadar güçlü bir insan bulamadığı için Gehenna'da sıkışıp kalmıştı. Bunu aşmak için, bir insan kadınından Okumura Rin adında bir çocuk sahibi oldu.Şeytan'ın oğlu, babasına yardım edecek mi, yoksa başka bir şeye mi dönüşecek? Bir ruh kovucuya mı?
description.uk: Дві сторони однієї монети, два виміри, які є віддзеркаленнями один одного - саме з них і складається всесвіт. Перший – це наш матеріальний світ, Ассія. Другий – це світ демонів, Геєна. За звичайних обставин ні подорож, ні який завгодно контакт між ними є неможливим. Проте демони можуть перетнути кордон, у що-небудь вселившись. Сатана - повелитель демонів і король Геєни, жодна жива душа в Ассії не здатна довго витримувати його присутність. І щоб створити сильне вмістилище, він зачав сина з людською жінкою, Ріна. Але чи погодиться Рін з його планами? Чи може все ж захоче стати кимось іншим?.. Екзорцистом?
description.pt-br: Este mundo consiste em duas dimensões unidas como uma só, como um espelho. O primeiro é o mundo em que vivem os humanos, Assiah. O outro é o mundo dos demônios, Gehenna. Normalmente, viajar entre os dois e, na verdade, qualquer tipo de contato entre os dois, é impossível. No entanto, os demônios podem passar para este mundo possuindo qualquer coisa que exista dentro dele. Satanás pode ser o rei dos demônios, mas há uma coisa que ele não possui: uma substância no mundo humano que seja poderosa o suficiente para contê-lo! Para isso ele criou Rin, seu filho com uma mulher humana, mas será que seu filho concordará com seus planos? Ou ele se tornará outra coisa...? Um exorcista?

altTitles.ja: ちょっとだけ抜けちゃう柊さん
Hiiragi-san is a little careless.

description.en: Kotori-kun, who falls in love with his classmate Hiiragi-san at first sight, somehow wants to get close to her. Hiiragi-san is quite an earnest and lovely girl, but… She’s surprisingly a little careless--! This is about the charming school life of a careless girl and a pure boy who gets led on everyday by her -- a romantic comedy that’s a wee bit H sometimes but warm and fluffy to death.

altTitles.ru: Приди же в Мир Демонов, Ирума-кун!

altTitles.th: อิรุมะคุงกับโรงเรียนปิศาจ

altTitles.ja: 魔入りました！入間くん

altTitles.id: Selamat datang di sekolah iblis! Iruma-kun

description.en: Hopeless pushover Iruma Suzuki has found himself in a devil of a predicament… His trashy parents have sold off his soul, and he now has to live and attend school in the Netherworld. But with his unique survival skills and doting demon grandfather’s support, Iruma will surely make it through this hellish experience. He’ll just need to subjugate rival classmates, summon familiars, and more, all while never revealing that he’s human… Easy as *aleph, bet, gimel*, right?
description.es:
Con una vida bastante desgraciada y unos padres vagos y avaros, Iruma es arrastrado al infierno contra su voluntad después de que estos lo vendan a un demonio. Pero para su sorpresa, la vida que le depara el inframundo es mucho mejor que la que tenía con su familia.

Bajo la tutela de su nuevo dueño, un poderoso, pero solitario demonio que sólo quería cumplir su anhelo de tener un nieto, empieza a asistir a un instituto del que este es director después de firmar cierto contrato con él.

Ahora, Iruma tiene que intentar adaptarse al mundo de los demonios mientras esconde su naturaleza humana y se enfrenta a los distintos desafíos que lo esperan en su nuevo instituto. ¡Su nueva vida demoníaca acaba de empezar!
description.ru: Четырнадцатилетний Судзуки Ирума только что был брошен и продан демону его безответственными родителями! Тем не менее, к своему удивлению, он оказывается теперь живет с демоном, как его приёмный внук. Затем он поступил в школу, где его дед — Салливан, работает в качестве директора. Так начинается необычайная школьная жизнь Ирумы-куна среди потусторонних, встречая много красочных лиц, принимая на себя сложные задачи, и сталкиваясь со своим истинным — я, когда он поднимается, чтобы стать кем-то великим. Уютная волшебная повседневность с случайным городским терроризмом.
description.tr: On dört yaşındaki Iruma Suzuki hiçbir isteğe hayır diyemez. Sorumsuz ailesi, onları geçinmek için onu tehlikeli işlerden tehlikeli işlere koşturtur ve sonra bir gün onu bir iblise satarlar! Ancak iblis, Iruma'yı torunu olarak evlat edinmek isteyince çok şaşırır. Bu isteği reddedemeyen Iruma, büyük iblis Sullivan'ın torunu olur. Yeni sevecen iblis dedesi onu, Sullivan'ın tesadüfen müdürü olduğu İblis Okulu Babyls'e kaydettirir. Böylece Iruma-kun'un diğer dünyadakiler arasındaki sıra dışı okul hayatı başlar; birçok renkli iblisle tanışır, zorlu mücadelelere atılır ve büyük biri olmak için yükselirken gerçek benliğiyle yüzleşir.
description.vi: Mairimashita! Iruma-kun là câu chuyện kể về cậu bé Suzuki Iruma, người đã bị bố mẹ mình kí khế ước bán cho ác ma để đổi lấy tiền tài và bình an. Cậu bé Iruma đáng thương từ lúc mới biết đi (1 tuổi) đã phải "ra xã hội" lăn lộn, buôn ba khắp nơi với hai vị phụ huynh "tưng tửng" cho đến ngày một Ác Ma đến rước cậu đến Ma giới theo khế ước. Tưởng chừng như sắp vào bụng quỷ thì vị Ác Ma già nua này đã khóc lóc yêu cầu cậu làm cháu trai ông ta, với bản tính lương thiện và tốt bụng đến cả bản thân mình cũng phải kinh ngạc, cậu bất đắc dĩ đã đồng ý lời đề nghị đó và nhập học trường Ác Ma theo ý ông ta. Chuyện gì sẽ xảy ra tiếp theo, mời các bạn theo dõi cuộc sống học đường đầy bất thường của Iruma-kun.
description.pt-br:
Iruma Suzuki, de quatorze anos, não pode dizer não a nenhum pedido. Seus pais irresponsáveis ​​o fazem trabalhar em empregos perigosos para sustentá-los, e então um dia eles o vendem para um demônio! Mas, para sua surpresa, o demônio quer adotar Iruma como seu neto?  

Incapaz de recusar seu pedido, Iruma torna-se neto do grande demônio Sullivan. Seu novo avô demônio amoroso o matricula na Demon School Babyls - onde Sullivan é coincidentemente o diretor. Assim começa a extraordinária vida escolar de Iruma-kun entre o outro mundo, encontrando muitos demônios coloridos, enfrentando desafios assustadores e enfrentando seu verdadeiro eu enquanto ele se torna alguém grande.

[ 1° TEMP. DO ANIME ADAPTOU ATÉ: Vol. 7, Cap 44. ]
[ 2° TEMP. DO ANIME ADAPTOU ATÉ: Vol. 11, Cap 94. ]
[ 3° TEMP. DO ANIME ADAPTOU ATÉ: Vol. 17, metade do Cap 147.]

description.en: Hana is a child who is known by the public as a genetically modified mouse. This is the story of what happens after Hana escapes from the lab.
description.ko:
유전자조작 쥐로 알려져 있는 아이 HANA(하나),
하나가 연구실에서 탈출하면서 일어나는 이야기들.

altTitles.ja: エンバーズ

description.en: Middle school brawler Noboru Haitani has never lost a fight. But the bitter taste of a soccer defeat gradually warms him up to the sport, until one day Haitani finds himself in a match against a team featuring middle school soccer prodigy Takami. An outlaw fights his way into the world of soccer!

"In this realm mythological creatures roam, descendant of the nine heavens they call home." 

Sibuxiang, a mythical deer-man couch potato, is kicked out of heaven and assigned to support the mythological creatures wandering the human world. He meets and goes on adventures with his friends: the energetic, food loving Pixiu named Pipi, the fanatic moon bunny Tuye, the banished-from-heaven mouse brothers Jinjiao and Yinjiao, and many others. What kind of adventures will they take on?
description.zh:
《人间有神兽，来自九重天 》

随着科技的发展，往日威风凛凛的神兽们日子大不如前。神兽四不像奉命下凡，去解救流落人间的落魄神兽。在凡间，他遇到了走投无路的老同事天禄，不得志的酒友兔爷，被贬下凡的金银角兄弟……从此开启了一段新的旅程。
description.es-la:
"En este reino, criaturas mitológicas deambulan, descendientes de los nueve cielos que llaman hogar."
Sibuxiang, un hombre-ciervo mitológico y perezoso, es expulsado del cielo y asignado a apoyar a las criaturas mitológicas que vagan por el mundo humano. Conoce y vive aventuras con sus amigos: el enérgico Pixiu amante de la comida llamado Pipi, el fanático conejo lunar Tony, los hermanos ratones Jinjiao y Yinjiao, también desterrados del cielo, y muchos otros. ¿Qué tipo de aventuras emprenderán?

altTitles.ja: バーサス

description.cs: Lidstvo bylo po stovky let utlačováno kvůli vzestupu a invazi našich přirozených nepřátel "démonů". Světu vládl "Velký král démonů" a jeho 47 "ďábelských vládců". Zatímco lidé žijí ve strachu, 47 lidí bylo vybráno z celého světa a zíkslai titul "Hrdinové" a připravují se na boj proti armádě velkého krále démonů. A nyní začíná plán jak zachránit lidstvo, jehož osud je teď na tenkém ledě.
description.en:
Centuries ago, humanity’s natural enemy, “Demons,” invaded the world and oppressed humankind. The Great Demon Lord and 47 subordinates known as Demon Lords have since dominated the world, while the human race lives on in fear.

In desperation, a last-ditch effort for humanity’s very survival is placed in the hands of 47 people gathered from across the world. These heroes will oppose the demon army and win back humanity’s freedom…or die trying!
___
**Compositor:** [bose](https://mangadex.org/author/aa8eb4f2-d4a2-4c4e-b6e8-2394f3b09b71)

**Alt Official English:** [K MANGA - United States only!](https://kmanga.kodansha.com/title/10569/episode/349625)
description.ja: 天敵“魔族”の台頭と侵攻により、人類が虐げられ続けて数百年。世界は“大魔王”と、その配下である47体の“魔王”により支配されていた。人々は怯えて暮らしながらも、世界中から選び抜かれた47人を“勇者”と名付け、魔王軍に対抗すべく準備を進めていた。そして今、人類の存亡を懸けた決死の作戦が始まろうとしていた―――。
description.ru:
Уже сотни лет человечество вынуждено существовать под гнётом своих естественных врагов — демонов, сумевших захватить мир. В их главе стоит Повелитель тьмы, и в подчинении его находятся сорок семь Королей.
Однако среди людей, чей дух сломлен вековым страхом, было отобрано столько же наречённых Героев, готовых сразиться с демонической армией. И, кажется, отчаянная борьба за судьбу человеческой расы начинается прямо сейчас...
description.pt-br: A humanidade foi oprimida por centenas de anos devido à ascensão e invasão do inimigo natural "demônios". O mundo era governado pelo "Grande Lorde Demônio" e seus 47 "Senhores Demônios". Enquanto as pessoas vivem com medo, 47 pessoas selecionadas de todo o mundo foram nomeadas "Heróis" e estão se preparando para lutar contra o exército do Rei Demônio. E agora, uma operação desesperada com a sobrevivência da humanidade em jogo estava prestes a começar.

altTitles.ja: メタファー：リファンタジオ

description.en:
The United Kingdom of Euchronia is thrown into chaos following the assassination of its king…
Our Hero, the Traveler Will, and his Fairy Companion Gallica, race to Grand Trad to undertake a Special Mission.
Discover the bonds that form between eight races across three countries. (MangaPlus)

Based off [the award-winning game!](https://store.steampowered.com/app/2679460/Metaphor_ReFantazio/)

Science or magic?

 « Welcome to Paris, elected for the 68th month in a row as the least polluted city in the world. Thanks to cyanel, the air we breathe inside our houses is purified. » 

In a futuristic Paris, pollution is so prevalent that all greenery has disappeared. Recently, a gigantic plant appeared in the heart of the city, and the authorities are making sure no one gets close… Thomas, a young science student, is secretly studying the phenomenon, hoping for a better life.

Raised by his witchcraft-loving grand-mother, he is often prone to hallucinations. One day, he crosses paths with a strange young girl with very bright eyes, who faints in the air. From then on, his fate changes…
description.fr:
Science ou magie ?

« Bienvenue à Paris, élue pour le 68e mois consécutif : Ville la moins polluée du monde. C’est grâce au cyanel que nous pouvons respirer un air purifié à l’intérieur de nos maisons. »

Dans un Paris futuriste, la pollution est tellement présente que toute végétation a disparu. Depuis peu, une plante gigantesque a fait son apparition au cœur de la ville, et les autorités veillent à ce que la population ne s’en approche pas… Thomas, un jeune étudiant scientiste, se livre secrètement à l’étude de ce phénomène, peut-être un espoir pour une vie meilleure.

Élevé par sa grand-mère passionnée de sorcellerie, il est souvent victime d’hallucinations. Un jour, il croise une étrange jeune fille aux yeux très clairs qui s’évanouit dans les airs. Dès lors, son destin va basculer….

description.en: A spin-off of the series *[The Angel Next Door Spoils Me Rotten](https://mangadex.org/title/2fec6641-beb1-4ae9-a32f-204dd06688ac/the-angel-next-door-spoils-me-rotten)* which comicalizes the stories from Volume 5.5 of the Light Novel and its special edition booklet, which contains additional short stories.
description.ja: 高校生の藤宮周が住むマンションの隣には、「天使様」と呼ばれる学校で一番の美少女・椎名真昼が住んでいる。特に関わり合いのなかった二人だが、雨の中ずぶ濡れになっていた彼女に傘を貸したことから、不思議な交流が始まり二人は少しずつ惹かれあっていく――。

altTitles.ja: ウマ娘シンデレラグレイ

description.en: Uma Musume: Cinderella Gray is a spin-off title of the Uma Musume project by Cygames. It follows Oguri Cap through her time at Kasamatsu Training Center Academy and on her journey of becoming a legendary horse girl.
description.ja: 寂れたカサマツの地に現れた、ひとりの灰被りの少女。後に“怪物”と呼ばれるその少女は、どこを目指して疾るのか――。地方から中央の伝説へ。
description.vi: Uma Musume: Cinderella Gray là một manga spin-off của series Uma Musume. Câu chuyện kể về Oguri Cap và cuộc hành trình trở thành một Mã Nương huyền thoại của cô.

altTitles.ja: 暴悪ゲーム

description.en: Lu Yao, a terminally ill patient, accidentally got a mysterious account and traveled to a different world called "Extremely Evil Game" to forcibly continue his life. As soon as he arrived at the scene, he became the No. 1 in the extremely evil list and was publicly wanted. As a rookie, the first time I have to face is the most dangerous "fierce" level trial - an extreme pull with the extremely evil monster girl group... Come here, it's better to play a big one! Isn't that the joy of living?
description.fr: Lu Yao, un patient en phase terminale, a accidentellement obtenu un compte mystérieux et a voyagé dans un monde différent appelé « Extremely Evil Game » pour continuer sa vie de force. Dès qu’il est arrivé sur place, il est devenu le numéro 1 de la liste extrêmement maléfique et a été publiquement recherché. En tant que débutant, la première fois que je dois faire face à l’épreuve la plus dangereuse du niveau « féroce » – une épreuve extrême avec le groupe de filles extrêmement maléfiques… Viens ici, c’est mieux de jouer un gros coup ! N’est-ce pas la joie de vivre ?

description.en: In a world where peoples' names grant them superhuman powers... Two agents from the Nordic Naming Bureau (NNB), an agency specialized in investigating crimes committed by "Namers", handle the case of a man and his missing wife and son. Things take a turn, however, when the duo come face to face with the man, who wishes to give his son the same name as himself...

altTitles.ja: 天傍台閣

description.en:
Since ancient times, the arcane arts have been used as tools of political strife and weapons of war. Practitioners of these arts, known as spellcasters, sought to ensure the survival of their kind by demonstrating the utility of their powers to the government.

However, as the ages passed and the number of spellcasters grew, momentum built within the arcane community to reassess their societal standing. It was in this climate that a nation of spellcasters—commonly known as the Eastern Enchantment—was born. And the governing body of this land came to be called… the Empyreal Cabinet.

The curtain rises on an arcane saga of magnificent scale, right now!!
___
**Additional Links:**
- [Official X](https://x.com/tembodaikaku)
description.ja: 掲載時のカラーページを完全収録!!】古来より《祕術》は政争の具や兵器として使われ、祕術を操る《術者》は為政者にその力の有用性を示すことで種の存続を図った。しかし、時代の流れと共に術者の人口が増加、祕術界では術者の社会的地位を見直す機運が高まる。そして誕生したのが通称《東仙境》と呼ばれる術者の郷国（くに）。その統治機関を人々はこう呼ぶ《天傍台閣》と。　壮大なスケールで贈る祕術大河、ここに開幕――!!

altTitles.en: Reborn as a Space Mercenary: I Woke Up Piloting the Strongest Starship!

altTitles.zh-hk: 覺醒起來就持有最強裝備和宇宙飛船，所以我決定以買一個私人住宅為目標作為傭兵自由地活下去

altTitles.ru: Я очнулся, будучи пилотом сильнейшего космического корабля, а потому решил стать межгалактическим наёмником

description.en:
Sato Takahiro was an ordinary office worker and hobbyist gamer until the day he woke up on a spaceship–one that strangely resembled a craft from a favorite space-shooter game. With a decked-out ship, a crew full of babes, and a fantastic universe to explore, he’s going to make the most of his good luck and create the life he’s always dreamed of!


---

**Links:**
- [Official English Light Novel](https://sevenseasentertainment.com/series/reborn-as-a-space-mercenary-i-woke-up-piloting-the-strongest-starship-light-novel/)
description.ja: 目が覚めたら、いきなり宇宙船の中だった。どうやら自分がドハマりしていたゲームに酷似した世界のようだ。幸い、愛用の宇宙船が一機ある。これなら傭兵家業で金には困らないし、ひなびた惑星に家でも買ってのんびり暮らすか！……と思っていた矢先に、無一文の美少女が転がり込んできて――。
description.ru: Это история о парне, неожиданно оказавшемся в открытом космосе с личным боевым кораблем. На этом космолёте он будет путешествовать, попутно спасать девушек, оказавшихся в беде, флиртовать с ними, зарабатывать деньги и использовать свои знания из игры, чтобы вести свободный и непринужденный образ жизни.

description.en:
A boy named Shi Shan and his little sister were offered as sacrifice to a demon that has been haunting their village. They were rescued by a martial artist who exorcised demons. He took the siblings in as his disciples and taught them the art of cultivation and about the demons that dwell in this world.

---
Translated raw sypnosis:

He said, "This world fundamentally should not have demons." And thus, all the lands became peaceful.
description.zh: 他说：“这世上本不该有鬼”。然后，这世间为之一清。（摘自腾漫）

altTitles.ja: ソードアート・オンライン・ユナイタル・リング

description.en: A year has passed since Kirito and Asuna’s return from the Underworld. With them is Alice, who has been given a physical body. But their peace is quickly broken when the three are suddenly thrust into an unfamiliar game, Unital Ring. This new world is a survival MMO that fuses together every VRMMO created with the Seed program. As soon as it starts, Kirito finds himself with nothing but his underwear. Now, he’s got to challenge a mysterious VRMMOSVG under desperate circumstances!
description.es-la: Ha pasado un año desde el regreso de Kirito y Asuna del Underworld. Con ellos está Alice, que ha recibido un cuerpo físico. Pero su paz se rompe rápidamente cuando los tres se ven empujados de repente a un juego desconocido, Unital Ring. Este nuevo mundo es un MMO de supervivencia que fusiona todos los VRMMO creados con el programa "The Seed". Nada más empezar, Kirito se encuentra sin nada más que su ropa interior. Ahora, ¡Tiene que desafiar a un misterioso VRMMOSVG en circunstancias desesperadas!

altTitles.es: El matón y la cuatro ojos

altTitles.ja: ヤンキー君とメガネちゃん

description.en:
The story starts with a seemingly unassuming class rep Adachi Hana who has taken an interest in the school's known delinquent, Shinagawa Daichi. Just what is her reason for following Daichi and wanting him to go on the class field trip?  


---
description.ru:
Дайчи Шинагава всегда хорошо дрался и себя в обиду не давал. Но на родине самураев на любого, кто хорошо умеет что-то делать: печь окамияки, играть на гармошке или драться – всегда найдется тот, кто бросит вызов его мастерству. Именно это и приключилось с Шинагавой, чем больше он дрался, и чем лучше у него это получалось, тем больше забияк стекалось к нему со всей округи. Все хотели побить его, чтобы получить сопутствующий «титул».Со временем Шинагава стал известным даже среди обычных школьников, те его стали сторониться и бояться, повесив клеймо «янки». Так в Японии называют хулиганов, любящих махать кулаками и вечно приходящих в школу с синяком под глазом.И все бы было ничего, если бы Шинагава не хотел в глубине души стать нормальным парнем, окончить школу и унаследовать отцовскую небольшую клинику. И вот, когда он поступил в новую школу, чтобы начать все сначала, но… ничего не изменилось: у ворот его снова ждали любители получать по морде, а одноклассники опять обходили стороной.Правда, было и кое-что новое, а именно – в его классе появилась на редкость позитивная ученица с необычайно развитым чувством доброжелательности. Она-то и взялась за беднягу Шинагаву, всячески пытаясь сделать из него человека.  
  
Note: The epilogue chapter was released six years after the manga had ended

altTitles.ru: Непринужденная жизнь в другом мире экс-кандидата в герои, оказавшегося читером со 2 уровня

altTitles.vi: Cuộc Sống Thảnh Thơi Tại Dị Giới Gian Lận Của Cựu Ứng Viên Dũng Giả Từ Cấp Độ Hai

description.en: Banaza, who was summoned to the magic kingdom of Cryroad as a Hero candidate, was disqualified as a Hero because of his ordinary abilities. He was supposed to be returned to his original world, but due to the magical kingdom's mistake, he became unable to return to his original world. However, the moment he reached Level 2, he acquired every single possible skill and kind of magic, turning him into a super cheat with infinite skills! Despite this, he takes Fenris of the demons as his wife, and fully enjoys his newly-married life with an easygoing smile. He changes his name to Fulio and tries to lead his life quietly, but things are a bit chaotic with the likes of a pet saber, four freeloading female knights, a Majin, and even an ex-Demon Lord. However, even with all of this chaos, he still manages to enjoy his life peacefully.
description.fr: Un jour, Banaza a été invoqué dans un autre monde, le Royaume magique de Cryroad en tant que candidat Héroïque. Malheureusement, Banaza fût disqualifié des candidats Héroïque car ces statistiques étaient très basique. Alors, le Royaume décida de l'emmener loin du château car il était inutile. Mais alors qu'il se retrouva tout seul, un ennemi apparu devant lui, avec quelques difficultés, il réussit à vaincre l'ennemi, c'est alors qu'il monta de niveau, mais pas tout à fait normalement…
description.ja: 栄えある勇者候補として異世界に召喚された青年バナザは、能力値の低さから勇者失格の烙印を押され国外追放処分となる。なんとか生き延びるべくモンスターを倒すと、レベルが２に上がり彼のステータスが見慣れない「∞」の記号に変わっていた……。突然のステータス変化に戸惑いながらもマイペースに生きていくことを決意するが、魔族の娘フェンリースと運命的な出会いを果たし――!?
description.ru:
Баназа был призван в волшебное королевство Крайроуд в качестве кандидата в герои, но на нём поставили крест, так как тот имел навыки обычного гражданина. Изначально он хотел вернуться в свой мир, но из-за ошибки представителей королевства не смог этого сделать и был вынужден остаться жить в другом мире. Сменив имя на Фурио, он решил жить в своё удовольствие. И вот так, прогуливаясь по новому для себя миру, он победил слизь, получил второй уровень и, взглянув после этого на характеристики, увидел, что все они имеют значение «∞». С этого и начинается его непринуждённая жизнь в другом мире.

---

(source: readmanga)
description.uk: Баназу, звичайного торговця, викликають до іншого світу і нарікають Героєм. Проте увагою він був оточений зовсім недовго - як тільки виявилось, що його здібності не відрізняються від здібностей пересічної людини, бідолаху виставили за двері без можливості повернутись додому. Так і почалось його спокійне життя у зовсім чужому світі, але як тільки він досягнув 2 рівня...
description.vi: Banaza là một thương nhân luôn chăm chỉ làm việc mỗi ngày đã bị đột nhiên triệu hồi tới Vương Quốc Ma Pháp Klyrode xa lạ làm ứng viên dũng sĩ. Tuy nhiên, anh đã bị đánh trượt vì chỉ có cấp độ 1 giống như dân thường. Không những vậy, anh còn không thể trở về vì sai lầm của chính quyền... Banza đã rời vương đô để tới vùng biên cảnh và phải chiến đấu với slime để giữ mạng. Thế rồi, câu chuyện có bước chuyển biến lớn sau khi anh thay đổi hình dáng và tên họ. Một ma thú đã phải lòng anh đi tới hôn nhân. Thế là họ cùng nhau hướng tới một cuộc sống thảnh thơi, không phân biệt chủng tộc!
description.pt-br:
Banaza foi invocado ao reino mágico de Cryroad como candidato a herói. No entanto, por ter especificações como as de uma pessoa comum, ele foi desqualificado e não pôde voltar ao seu mundo devido a um erro das pessoas que o invocaram. Sendo apenas nível 2, Banaza obterá forças além de sua compreensão.  


---

配信でもっこりを見せつける男の娘‼

しかし、それが以外にも人気が出てしまい…⁉

description.en:
Stinky tofu, durian, surstromming’s era is over. have you heard? cooking that’s so bad that you could die on the spot! but skill is increasing!?

Tera, whose cooking boasts the best(?) taste in all dimensions, through the bravest yoo seungwoo’s help, has come to peaceful(?) earth.

Endure it! if you eat it and don’t die, your level will go up! and then on behalf of me, protect the earth!

‘Extraordinary restaurant’ is open even when the world is going to end.
description.ko:
취두부, 두리안, 수르스트뢰밍의 시대는 갔다.
들어는 봤는가? 문자 그대로 죽을 만큼 맛없는 요리!
하지만 능력이 오른다!?

전 차원 최고(?)의 맛을 자랑하는 테라의 요리가
최강의 용사, 유승우의 손에 의해 평화로운(?) 지구를 찾아온다.

인내하라! 먹고 죽지만 않으면 허약한 당신도 레벨이 쑥쑥!
그리고 나 대신 지구를 지켜라!


'괴식식당'은 세상이 멸망해도 영업합니다!

altTitles.ja: 新ルパン三世

description.en:
Lupin the Third and his motley crew return in Shin Lupin III! This time, several of the stories are either brand new or adapted from or to the Lupin anime, and the beginning story was even animated by itself several years later!  
  
Lupin the Third is the grandson of the famous literary thief Arsène Lupin, and his partners in crime include the sharpshooter Jigen Daisuke, the stoic samurai Goemon Ishikawa the Thirteenth, and the on-again-off-again lover/enemy Fujiko Mine. Their goal is to outwit enemies bigger than themselves while nabbing the world's rarest and most important items, while also outwitting the dogged Inspector Zenigata, who's made it his life's work to capture and secure Lupin. In the manga however, his relationship with the titular thief isn't as "respecting to the enemy" as you would expect, as he's attempted multiple times to kill him without shedding a tear!   
  
What kind of sexy exploits will Lupin and his crew get up to next in…Shin Lupin III!

title.en: Ore no Shibou Flag ga Todomaru Tokoro wo Shiranai

altTitles.ja: 俺の死亡フラグが留まるところを知らない

altTitles.en: My Death Flags Show No Sign of Ending

altTitles.zh: 不知我的死亡flag将于何处停止

altTitles.fr: Des risques mortels n'arrêtent pas de m'arriver

description.en: When he came to his senses, Hirasawa Kazuki, a normal university student, found himself in possession of the body of a game's character. Moreover, it was Harold Stokes, the story's most hated character who was even given the title『King of Trash』by the players. Myriads of landmines are just waiting for him to step on them, like death flags! Will Harold be able to clear the survival route while avoiding the countless death flags in his way?!
description.fr: Lorsqu'il reprend ses esprits, Hirasawa Kazuki, un étudiant universitaire normal, se retrouve en possession du corps du personnage d'un jeu. De plus, c'est Harold Stokes, le personnage le plus détesté de l'histoire, qui a même été baptisé 『Roi des connards』par les joueurs. L'histoire est un terrain miné qui n'attend que lui pour exploser ! Harold pourra-t-il se dégager un chemin de survie tout en évitant les innombrables "mines" de l'histoire ? Des myriades de mines attendent qu’il les écrase, comme des drapeaux de mort (Game Over)!
description.ja: 普通の大学生、平沢一希は気が付くと自身がやり込んだゲーム『Brave Hearts』の悪役キャラ、ハロルド・ストークスに憑依していた。 このままゲームのシナリオが消化されていくといずれ主人公たちに倒され死んでしまう！？ 作中でも屈指の強さを誇るハロルドの肉体とゲームの 知識で盛りだくさんの死亡フラグを回避してつかみ取れるか生存ルート！？

title.en: A Red Laurel To My Emperor

altTitles.zh-hk: 為我的皇帝獻上紅月桂花

altTitles.en: Red Laurel Flowers to My Emperor

description.en: Laurel Neales, the first princess of Tortia, has been married off to the emperor of Kairos following a political feud that ended with the assassination of her parents. Undiscouraged by the circumstances, Laurel refuses to give in to becoming yet another of the emperor's concubines. Instead, she plays along with his romantic whims and gains her own form of power in this new life by proposing an offer he cannot refuse: to facilitate his conquest of the land that betrayed her.

altTitles.ja: 尾守つみきと奇日常。

altTitles.fr: Ogami Tsumiki et l'étrange vie du quotidien

altTitles.pt-br: Tsumiki Ogami e seu estranho coditiano.

altTitles.ru: Цумики Огами и странная повседневная жизнь

altTitles.es: Tsumiki Omori y la extraña vida cotidiana.

altTitles.es-la: Tsumiki Omori y la extraña vida cotidiana.

altTitles.vi: Tsumiki Ogami Và Cuộc Sống DIệu Kỳ

description.en:
Today, we live in an age of diversity. The phrase "non-humans" is a thing of the past. "Genjin" live their lives interacting with human beings.

One human boy, Yutaka Shinsou, is troubled. He is so used to being in tune with his surroundings that he no longer understands his own feelings. At Keiki High School, where many "Genjin" attend, he meets Tsumiki Ogami, a werewolf. She is cute, powerful, a little out of the ordinary, and kind. When he spends time with her, Yutaka's heart is somehow noisier than usual. Spinning an "unusual" everyday life with Tsumiki the werewolf.
description.es: Hoy vivimos en la era de la diversidad. La expresión "no humanos" es cosa del pasado. Los "genjin" viven sus vidas interactuando con los seres humanos. Un chico humano, Yutaka Shinsou, tiene problemas. Está tan acostumbrado a estar en sintonía con su entorno que ya no comprende sus propios sentimientos. En el instituto Keiki, al que acuden muchos "genjin", conoce a Tsumiki Ogami, una mujer lobo. Es guapa, poderosa, un poco fuera de lo común y amable... Cuando pasa tiempo con ella, el corazón de Yutaka hace más ruido de lo normal. Hilando una "inusual" vida cotidiana con Tsumiki, la mujer lobo. El nuevo gráfico normal de la juventud está a punto de comenzar.
description.fr:
Aujourd'hui, nous vivons à l'ère de la diversité. L'expression « non-humains » appartient au passé. Les « Genjin » vivent leur vie en interaction avec les êtres humains.

Un garçon humain, Yutaka Shinsou, est troublé. Il est tellement habitué à être en phase avec son environnement qu'il ne comprend plus ses propres sentiments. Au lycée Keiki, que fréquentent de nombreux « Genjin », il rencontre Tsumiki Ogami, un loup-garou. Elle est mignonne, puissante, un peu hors du commun et gentille.

Lorsqu'il passe du temps avec elle, le cœur de Yutaka est plus bruyant que d'habitude. Une vie quotidienne « inhabituelle » avec Tsumiki le loup-garou.

Le nouveau parcours normal de la jeunesse est sur le point de commencer.
description.ja:
ウェアウルフの尾守つみきさんと紡ぐ、「普通」じゃない日常――

多様性の時代とされる現代。ついこの間まで「人ならざる存在」だった「幻人」は今は人間と関わり合って生活しています。舞台は、幻人が多く通う景希高校。そこにいたのは、ウェアウルフの尾守つみき（おがみつみき）さん。モフモフの耳と尻尾が揺れる、天真爛漫な美少女。真層友孝（しんそうゆたか）くんは、悩める人間の少年。人間関係が原因で、自分のことが分からなくなりました。友孝くんはつみきさんと出会い、自分の「気持ち」を見つけていきます。

「…人間って大変だぁ～」

日常が変わっていく、つみきさんと一緒なら。まだ誰も知らない、ニューノーマルな青春がここに。
description.pl:
Obecnie żyjemy w erze różnorodności. Wyrażenie „nie-ludzie” należy już do przeszłości. „Genjin” żyją w interakcji z ludźmi.

Pewien ludzki chłopiec, Yutaka Shinsou, jest zaniepokojony. Jest tak przyzwyczajony do bycia w zgodzie z otoczeniem, że nie rozumie już własnych uczuć. W Liceum Keiki, gdzie uczęszcza wielu „Genjin”, spotyka Tsumiki Ogami, wilkołaka. Jest urocza, potężna, trochę nietypowa i miła.

Kiedy spędza z nią czas, serce Yutaki staje się głośniejsze niż zwykle. Niezwykłe niecodzienne życie z wilkołakiem Tsumiki.
description.ru: Сегодня мы живём в эпоху культурного разнообразия. "Нелюди" постепенно ушли из словесного оборота. "Гендзины" живут своей жизнью, взаимодействуя с людьми. Один из человеческих мальчиков, Ютака Шинсо, кое-чем обеспокоен. Он настолько привык быть в гармонии со своим окружением, что перестал понимать свои собственные чувства. В средней школе Кэйки, где учатся многие "гендзины", он знакомится с оборотнем Цумики Огами. Она милая, сильная, немного странная и добрая... Когда Ютака проводит с ней время, его сердце почему-то бьется чаще обычного.
description.vi: Thời hiện đại trong câu chuyện này là thời đại của "đa dạng" giống loài, những chủng tộc bán nhân có một tên gọi mới là"Genjin" và sống cùng nền văn minh con người. Yukata Shinsou, 1 học sinh năm nhất cao trung bình thường quyết dịnh nhập học vào một ngôi trường tư thục có tỉ lệ Genjin cao nhất nước để tránh mặt những người bạn sơ trung của mình. Và rồi cậu gặp được Tsumiki Ogami, một cô nàng Genjin dạng người sói, và cô ấy sẽ dẫn cậu tận hưởng cuộc sống cao trung đầy màu sắc!
description.es-la: Hoy vivimos en la era de la diversidad. La expresión "no humanos" es cosa del pasado. Los "genjin" viven sus vidas interactuando con los seres humanos. Un chico humano, Yutaka Shinsou, tiene problemas. Está tan acostumbrado a estar en sintonía con su entorno que ya no comprende sus propios sentimientos. En el instituto Keiki, al que acuden muchos "genjin", conoce a Tsumiki Ogami, una mujer lobo. Es guapa, poderosa, un poco fuera de lo común y amable... Cuando pasa tiempo con ella, el corazón de Yutaka hace más ruido de lo normal. Hilando una "inusual" vida cotidiana con Tsumiki, la mujer lobo. El nuevo gráfico normal de la juventud está a punto de comenzar.
description.pt-br:
Hoje, vivemos numa era de diversidade. A frase “não-humanos” é coisa do passado. “Genjin” vivem suas vidas interagindo com seres humanos.

Um menino humano, Yutaka Shinsou, está preocupado. Ele está tão acostumado a estar em sintonia com o ambiente que não entende mais seus próprios sentimentos. No Colégio Keiki, onde muitos "Genjin" estudam, ele conhece Tsumiki Ogami, uma lobisomem. Ela é fofa, poderosa, um pouco fora do comum e gentil.

Quando ele passa um tempo com ela, o coração de Yutaka fica mais acelerado do que o normal. Girando uma vida cotidiana "incomum" com o lobisomem Tsumiki.

O novo gráfico normal da juventude está prestes a começar.
